name: Nightly Hobo
description:
You have lost everything and now you have to loot dumpsters and  return bottles to feed yourself. It's the third game i've finished and has some bugs but i might update it later if i have the motivation.

Here are some tips for the game(Reading recommended):

-This is NOT a horror game even though it may look like one.

-Assistant is not necessary but really useful.

-Explore all the buildings

-Try aiming at people with the gun. Maybe something will happen.

-Be careful when hiring workers. You can't fire them afterwards.

-There are 30 dumpsters in the map.

-Sleeping will save the game.

-Once you have the assistant don't collect the bottles from storage because you can sell them instantly on the computer.

-Once the hunger bar hits U you die.(Will be fixed later probably)

-To finish the game you must go to the bartender with 10 000$

-Sleeping resets the loot in the dumpsters

-You can get a job from the bank if you have the suit

-Leaving the game when having a lot of workers is not recommended as you will lose all the bottles in storage(Might get fixed)
